name: The Confusion Forest Island
description:
GAME OBJECTIVE
  • Make sure you survive until complete objectives
  • Find and Collect all objective in environment.
  • Avoid Monsters around you.
  • You can hunt small animals for crafting food.
  • Stand still at the portal after complete objectives for enter the portal
  • You can rest until dawn at the old tree

P.S. Be careful !! The environment change everyday.

Have a nice day <3



CONTROL     [] Mouse

             - Left Click for Attack  

    [] Keyboard

             - W, A, S, D for Movement

             - Left-Shift for Run

             - E for Collect Items

             - F for Interact

             - B for Open Inventory & Crafting

             - O for Open Objective

             - R for Hold Weapon for make player can Attack

             - T for Open torch light
